sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import '../App.css'; function WebtoonDetail() { const { id } = useParams(); // Extract the webtoon ID from the URL const [webtoon, setWebtoon] = useState(null); const [error, setError] = useState(null); useEffect(() => { // Fetch webtoon details from the backend using the ID fetch(`http://localhost:5000/api/webtoons/${id}`) .then((response) => { if (!response.ok) { throw new Error('Failed to fetch webtoon details'); } return response.json(); }) .then((data) => setWebtoon(data)) .catch((err) => setError(err.message)); }, [id]); if (error) { return
Error: {error}
; } if (!webtoon) { return
Loading...
; } return (
Home Categories {webtoon.category}
{webtoon.commentsCount}
{webtoon.views}

{webtoon.name}

{webtoon.studio}
{webtoon.views} Views

{webtoon.description}

  • Type: TV Series
  • Studio: {webtoon.studio}
  • Status: Airing
  • Genre: {webtoon.categorie}
  • Rating: {webtoon.rating}
  • Views: {webtoon.views}
  • Episodes: {webtoon.episodes.length}
Follow Watch Now
Reviews
{webtoon.reviews.map((review, index) => (
{review.user} - {new Date(review.date).toLocaleString()}

{review.comment}

))}
Your Comment
Episodes
{webtoon.episodes.map((episode, index) => (
Ep {episode.episodeNumber}
{episode.views}
Episode {episode.episodeNumber} - {episode.duration}
))}
); } export default WebtoonDetail;
